title: Book now!
text: Odelis was my angel in waiting. I was in a bad situation while staying with an old friend (so bad that I actually contacted the health department and adult protective services) and needed to check in early. The room was inexpensive, clean, comfortable, excellently located, watched the eclipse on the roof with newfound friends, highly recommend and will definitely stay again. AND, it’s pet friendly!

title: Awesome experience!
text:
Awesome hotel! The room is great, clean and modern. The roof top deck was so cool and got to watch the eclipse from there, great little gathering! And best of all was how nice the manager of the hotel is, so helpful and friendly! I love this place!
Mike

title: Great Hotel in NYC
text:
The staff of the lobby was amaizing and everything was so clean at the room. 
Also very near from the 5th Avenue and the subway.
Good breakfast too. 
I will come back here definitely during my next trip at NYC because the price and the quality are worth it.

title: Love to come back at The Lex
text: I travel for work at least once a months to NYC and The Lex is our company's preferred hotel.  We do have few, but I love staying here. Small boutique hotel, very quiet, I love a room with balcony where I can work when it's nice outside. I like the complimentary breakfast they offered especially when going into a meeting at 8 am in the morning, small bite is much appreciate it!

title: Eye opening
text: Excellent experience all around. Service and location were impeccable. Room was clean and comfortable. I highly recommend this to both business and recreational travelers. I was hesitant at first but would stay here again for my next trip. Cost was reasonable as well for NYC.

title: Comfortable stay
text: My partner and I had a great stay at The Lex NYC. The front of house staff, especially Odalis was exceptional. The rooms are what you would expect if you need a comfortable place to sleep after enjoying a full day in the city. We would be happy staying at The Lex NYC again in the future. Also, the coffee is actually pretty good for hotel coffee!

title: Another great stay.
text: We arrived at the hotel at 2.20 am because of flight delays. We were cheerfully welcomed by the receptionist, the room was impeccable super clean and very quiet We could not hear traffic because our room was located at the back of the property away from the street. The view was bad😂All we could see were two enormous reservoirs of some kind . We will take quiet over street view! All personnel we interacted with was very friendly, helped in any way they could . The area has a multitude of restaurants, bodegas , etc We have stayed there several times and have never been disappointed.

title: Great location, great service
text: The room is small and simple but very clean and the bed is comfortable. The bathroom is really nice and the shower pressure is really good. The location is ideal for sightseeing and plenty of restaurants and bars around. Although it's located in a busy street, I didn't hear noise at any point during my stay. Service is excellent! Will gladly come back

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text: Great experience at the Lex! I checked the reviews before booking my stay in NYC. I needed something close to midtown as my wife and I had dinner and some after hour drinks planned around 34th Street. Check in was smooth and easy, Chris made sure to tell us all about the continental breakfast and everything our room came with, coffee, tea and how to turn the shower on haha (definitely needed that tip). The room was clean and fresh on our arrival and the bed was actually really comfortable. The Lex will definitely be on our list next time we're in NYC!

title: Thanks for a great time!!
text: I stayed at the Lex Hotel and it was great! The room was great! Nice bathroom and a nice bed. The breakfast was tasty (especially the coffee). And big compliments to the fantastic staff. Always nice and I could ask them all my questions about the city. When I checked out I was allowed to leave my suitcase with Romeo, which was super sweet and nice!

title: Superou as expectativas
text:
O hotel superou as expectativas. Considerando os preços que são praticados pela hotelaria em Nova Iorque, este hotel cobra uma tarifa extremamente justa.
A localização não é tão central, mas o lado positivo é que fica fora da muvuca (isso deve ajudar na tarifa mais baixa). Apesar disso, tem de tudo por perto.
O quarto que pegamos (acredito que seja o mais básico) tinha um tamanho ok; cama, travesseiros, coberta e roupas de cama de muito boa qualidade; banheiro com bom tamanho.
A limpeza do hotel me surpreendeu também, especialmente o serviço de quarto. 
O ponto alto, ao meu ver, foi a cordialidade e a prestatividade de toda a equipe. Faço um elogio especial ao Cris, pois ele me ajudou em inúmeras situações e se mostrou sempre muito cordial e paciente.
Para quem deseja economizar, ainda é servido um café continental (super básico) mas já serve para não sair de barriga vazia.
Enfim, pelo contexto geral o hotel foi uma excelente escolha.

title: Cortesia e ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo
text: La struttura si trova in una zona strategica che consente di raggiungere facilmente con metro e bus i vari punti di Manhattan. Tutto il personale (che ringraziamo) è molto cortese e molto collaborativo. È compresa nel prezzo una colazione con caffè americano, cornetti, muffen, latte, tisane, succo di frutta e frutta. Non c'è una grande varietà ma è una buona colazione. La stanza che ci è stata assegnata era di dimensioni medie con pochi posti per riporre le valige e vestiti (c'è solo un armadio e due comodini. La struttura e le stanze sono molto pulite. Gli asciugamani, su richiesta, vengono cambiati tutti i giorni senza modifiche del prezzo. Noi abbiamo avuto solo un piccolo problema: il fancoil non funzionava molto bene ed era un po' rumoroso. Avvertito il personale del problema, si sono offerti di cambiarci immediatamente stanza ma noi siamo rimasti nella nostra perché il problema era gestibile. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è molto buono e si ha la garanzia di essere accolti da uno staff competente e molto gentile. Lo consigliamo sicuramente.

title: Excepcional !! Odalis the best
text: Espectacular, la ubicación es perfecta el hotel muy cómodo ,la cama excepcional además el hotel está cerca de las estaciones del metro , y la atención que recibimos de odalis fue única nos explicó cómo llegar a los mejores lugares de la ciudad.

title: Great place to stay!
text:
I picked this hotel because of its value and location. Odalis was very welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable about the surrounding area, I ended up dining out at one of the restaurants he recommended, and indeed it was very good. 

Overall, a  nice stay and will stay again.

title: Great Location and AMAZING Service!
text:
I had an incredible experience! Everyone was so accommodating. The room was clean and specious. Perfect location! Highly recommended!
The reservation was done through Expedia, who sold / passed the reservation to another Agency called Travel Pass (Counter). At the time of booking, Travel Pass made several mistakes with the reservation. The whole situation was extremely frustrating; nonetheless, Odalis at the Lex Boutique Hotel went above and beyond to assist me. He actively listened to the issue and immediately offered to resolve the issue. My experience went from great to AMAZING! I look forward to staying at your hotel again soon! Thank you for making my stay a memorable one! 
Janine Gonzalez

title: Looking for a large hotel room - this is the one!
text:
Visited NYC for a family celebration with my brother and his family. We got two rooms with tow beds. The rooms were HUGE!!! So much space between the beds, very confutable for a couple with kinds. I got a one bed room, also very large with a wait for it.....BALCONY!! In NYC you get to drink your coffee outside of your rooms was a true pleasure.
When we visit again next year, We will be back!

title: Great property
text:
Beautiful hotel for a weekend in NYC. Close the attractions,  to times Square, museums and yet sleep like a baby :)
We liked the complimentary breakfast and coffee and the restaurants options near by... we got a lust with discounts from the hotel staff. Memorable weekend

title: Large and quiet hotel in the midtown east - NYC
text: Amazing hotel and costumer service!! I have never stayed at this hotel before so I was interested in experience a small boutique hotel. I was simply surprised how large their rooms are, they are the size of a studio apartment! So much space and best of all, I got a room with a balcony. You NYC hotel can beat the size and the balcony. Clean and quiet hotel. The  staff is very friendly and accommodations. I will come back for sure.

title: Very disappointing with a terrible odor
text: The photos do not show the realistic experience here.  I am not sure if I was put in a very old room or what but it smelled SO bad and felt very dirty.  It smelled like an old place that used to allow smoking and the smell never went away.  I was put with a sliding glass door that went out to the water reservoirs.  Pigeons were basically nonstop out there.  I am not phased by noises when I stay in NYC but this was over the top. The bathroom was fine and seemed to be relatively newly renovated.  I inspected for bedbugs when I got there because the overall cleanliness was terrible.   The bed and pillows were so uncomfortable.  I am not very picky but this was overall SO disappointing.  I spent the whole stay contemplating finding a new hotel but inevitably didn't want to waste the money.

title: Great Times
text: Best staff, Excellent Service and very clean. Loved the accommodations and Odalis, the manager, was outstanding. Thank you for having me. Would definitely recommend everyone I know to visit the Hotel. I know that I definitely will be back.

title: Thank God for Chris O.
text:
My review is for Chris O. who assisted me with an upcoming stay at The Lex. The problem was with Expedia who sold my reservation to another agency. The frustration was enormous. Chris O. was kind, caring, understanding and went above & beyond to assist me. Our stay at The Lex is for November 11, 2023. I hope to meet him and thank him personally. 
Susan Wachtel

title: Fantastic Service makes our stay adorable
text:
Clean, perfectly modern and spacious enough, with a GREAT Rooftop deck, and lots cheaper than other hotels we looked at, PLUS AMAZING Service - above and beyond.

We booked a standard room through an agent. Then got an email offering an upgrade at what we thought was a reasonable added cost. So we upgraded. BUT - got to the hotel and the agent had booked TWO rooms for us, and charged and paid the hotel for two rooms. 

The following morning, the Manager "Odalis" offered to call the agent, instead of me, seeing that I was clearly flustered. Odalis was on the phone for almost 30 minutes, having to call another staff member to deal with another customer on the phone and a customer entering into the foyer with their luggage. 

The agent wanted still to charge me for the first night, but Odalis wouldn't have any of it and said the Hotel wanted to give a full refund for what was clearly the agent's fault. Odlis won the slightly heated argument and whilst we will be here for 10 nights, I hope to see the refund asap. 

We love our superior room. The breakfast, (cereals, fruit, muffins etc)  included in the price, is totally sufficient to set us up for the day and means more savings in terms of eating out during the day. 

And a final heads-up for the rooftop area. Lovely and large with lots of nooks and alcoves to also be quiet and private. 

This is a great place to stay and excellent value for money. Do it.!

title: Nice staff, mediocre rooms
text: We stayed at the Lex for 2 nights in October. We had stayed at the Hilton in midtown for 2 nights prior for a work related conference and moved after the conference due to the proximity of the Lex in relation to our daughters apartment. We have  stayed in many places throughout Manhattan over the years and recognize the value of proximity, size, amenities ect… First I have to say that the front staff, regardless of the time of day, was always excellent. They are friendly and accommodating to whatever your needs are. The rooms were however, not as nice as others we’ve stayed in for the same price range and area. The bathroom was nice - and spacious - but the wall ac/heat unit was difficult to adjust and the room smelled quite musty. The size of the room (and bathroom) was much bigger than the Freehand hotel which is close by but the decor/furnishings are very simplistic at the Lex. There was also no outlet in the bathroom or anywhere near a mirror outside of the bathroom which was odd and made getting ready to go out a challenge. Also, we left the room at 11am and returned at 10pm and although we hung the sign for housecleaning-  nobody cleaned our room. This is becoming more common at hotels - but usually they ask you upon check in or tell you that you need to request it. We just assumed by hanging the sign that it would be provided. We didn’t make it to breakfast from 7-9 so I cannot comment on that - the rooftop was just a basic NYC rooftop sitting space -  nothing exciting. Overall, despite the nice staff- I think we’ll stay elsewhere in the area in the future - like the Broadway plaza.

title: Accommodating and Comfortable
text: I love the theme hallways. I felt like I was walking through a jungle and the walls were very textured. The room was clean and spacious. Miguel at the front desk was so welcoming and helped with our accommodations and provided and am wake up call. We had a late check out the day before and paid an extra fee but like the staff and hotel we stayed and extra night. If you have food ask to hold your meal in the refrigerator.

title: Great staff!!
text: Staff are the best thing about our stay. Warm, courteous and caring. Able to give directions to using the subway to get around New York. Location is close to our daughter so we are pleased to look forward to our future stays. I recommend The Lex to other visiting parents and grandparents!

title: Great place to stay in NYC ❤️
text: Great place to stay!! Central Manhattan location. Staff so friendly and accommodating. Suites awesome. Continental breakfast every morning. Would stay here every visit to New York City for business or pleasure.

title: LEX HOTEL >>>>>> Here we go <<<<
text:
HELLO I am back to NYC for my business trip and I stayed in LEX HOTEL gain !!! 

LOVELY PLACE full of positive vibes and clean place to relax after long day in NYC !!! Walking distance to all what u need , great restaurants just on every step , My favourite Indian restaurant it’s just on the corner , great food! 
STAFF are welcoming like always , special thank you for GM Odalis Garcia for his welcoming and great customer service  all the time ! 
I WILL BE BACK VERY SOON ! 
 
One of the best Hotels in Big Apple !  NYC 
 REGARDS !!!!

title: Chivalry is Back!
text: Located in Manhattans Lower East Side, you will find a  boutique style hotel in which you will receive a genuine welcome into the hotel from guest service associates. Other exchanges of pleasantries are expressed upon entering and check in. Yes! Chivalry is still alive. Without a doorman, guest service agents solely open doors for guest toting bags,  and with hands filled. Clear information is provided about the facility and its surroundings New York area.. Not only was this information shared verbally but it is also given to you on a printed sheet of paper while you still are at the front desk. Although the facility itself could use a bit of tuning up, with main areas of the hotel room  a bit outdated. The exemplary guest service team held up this hotels framework. Cozy get away  with a rooftop lounge.

title: Clean, Cozy, and Convenient
text: Second time staying here, I love this clean and cozy hotel! The staff is always friendly (Odalis and Sonia are super helpful!) and the hotel is in a convenient location to great restaurants and shopping.

title: Great stay
text: We stayed at the Lex for two days. The hotel room, bathroom and common areas were impeccably clean.  Patrick and all personnel working in the reception area were extremely professional, friendly and accommodating .Because of flight disruptions we arrived in the middle of the night and after mentioning we wanted to buy some supplies one of the employees stepped outside to check and make sure the closest store was still open. Great customer service, very good location, we plan on staying again .

title: Great overall stay near Union square!!
text: The check in and check out process was super easy. I enjoyed how attentive the front desk staff are, Miguel and Romeo. The bathroom in my room was spacious and extremely clean. After check out I was able to leave my baggage to pick it up later, this was a great service provided. Would stay here again!!

title: I’m will be back
text:
Great location 
I can’t wait to return …. Near many good restaurants 
I was able to check in early I was greeted by Odalis and Romeo who were extremely helpful !!! Terrific comfy room 

Perfect shower and extremely clean !!!

title: Awesome stay at the Lex!!!!!
text: What a wonderful hotel to stay. The excellent customer service started right at the front door. A long hard days work to a warm welcoming from front desk staff at the Lex I knew it was going to be a wonderful stay. The location was excellent right in the heart of New York City with plenty of food and bar spots nearby. I stayed just one night with my significant other and I would highly recommend going back! It was Awesome! We even got free coffee delivered to us in the morning! Love love love!

title: Amazing stay for my birthday weekend!
text: The hotel was very clean, and beautiful. The rooms were quiet and the staff was very friendly. It was a great place to stay in a very convenient location. We enjoyed our stay very much. Bringing unlimited coffee tea and ice to the room for us was a nice touch. I would recommend this hotel without a doubt

title: A very nice hotel in a great location.
text:
The location of this hotel is perfect, located at the edge of Flatiron District. The subway is nearby and you can walk to most destinations in Midtown in under 40 minutes. We had a room on the 7th floor, with a balcony facing away from the street, which was nice and quiet (for Manhattan anyway). A view of the Chrysler Building was a nice addition :). The staff is incredibly nice and helpful. The room, though named "cozy", was actually big enough for the two of us and we had no problem with space even with multiple pieces of luggage. The hotel is not very big, so you can actually enjoy a little peace and solitude after a long day in NYC.

The breakfast was indeed continental - so you basically get what you are promised. Some basic (and not very fresh) pastries, jam, coffee, orange juice, some fruit and cereal. It would be okay if everything wasn't soooo sugary. Just don't expect a full british/german style breakfast buffet :).

I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice, quiet hotel in a convenient location for a reasonable price.

title: Amazing Staff, Central Area
text: First time in NY, and stayed in Lex hotel. Very Central to everything in the city and close to the Subway. Really nice staff and the breakfast was lovely. I felt very safe in this hotel. I booked through Booking.com and there was a bit of a hiccup, but Lex's staff refunded me for an error with Booking.com. I recommend booking directly through the hotel. They even said next time in town I get a discount on my stay!

title: Love!
text: Odalis at the front desk was absolutely amazing. He accommodated me and let me check in early and truly cared about my stay here. 10/10 recommend. You will get the service you are looking for and you get a rooftop view!

title: Un buen hotel de tres estrellas
text: Estuvimos alojados del 28 de abril hasta el 6 de mayo. Lo único que destacaría es que habitación que nos alojamos (la 502), olía a cerrado, tal vez se debería pasar un ambientador antes de asignarla. Otro aspecto seria que la última noche que nos alojamos ( la noche del 5 de mayo) , le pedimos al recepcionista cuando llegamos ( sobre las 23:00), que nos dejara utilizar el baño que hay enfrente de la recepción, y de una manera poco amable no dijo que no nos dejaba utilizarlos. Por lo demás todo correcto. Desayuno suficiente aunque a veces algo incómodo por la falta de espacio cuando se juntan mucho clientes para desayunar.

title: Like home  sweet  home
text: Pase 23 dias en Lex Hotel  basta decir que  me sentía en  casa el personal  excelente  muy atensiosos Katherine  Chris  Patrick  y Romeo    forman un gran equipo !localización  muy cómoda y central cerca de casi todos lo que Manhattan   oferece  tube mucha   y recibi un  quarto extraordinario  grande y con balcon   también  la cama era muy comfy  Agradezco  especialmente  al General  Manager  Odalis García  que nos proporcionó   a mi marido y  yo  una muy agradable  temporada  en su hotel y en Nueva York!

title: Très bien
text:
personnel très accueillant et souriant , prend son temps pour nous expliquer (notre anglais est moyen😂) en particulier Roméo ,  les chambres sont correctes,  dans la salle de bain des petits savons, ainsi que plusieurs tubes de gel douche. Pour le petit déjeuner, ne vous attendez pas  a un super petit déj pas beaucoup de choix.
 L'hôtel est très bien situé.

title: Je recommande
text: Très bon séjour. Hôtel très propre et tres bien situé. Belle chambre. Petit déjeuner copieux et pris sur roof top. Seul bémol, un peu bruyantes sont les chambres qui donnent côté avenue mais c’est NYC. Personnel très accueillant . Très bon rapport qualité prix. Je recommande.

title: Great Hotel!
text: Great and Friendly staff. The receptionist who's name was Odalis was very attentive and knowledgeable of the area. While I waited to get check in he offered me coffee and expedited my check-in. The location was great and close to the subway and walking distance to many attractions. I would surely be staying at The Lex again.

title: Good choice
text: Amazing place, service and location! Will recommend to stay and also will come back in my future trips to NYC. Excellent service from the people that works at the Lex. Thanks Romeo for your assistance!

title: NY March 23
text:
Good location, very clean, staff always good and attentive 
A very easy stay for New York rooms small but good for New York 
Very safe 24 hr desk 
Breakfast a bit disappointing but sufficient plenty cafes and restaurants very close 
Subway 5 minutes walk 
 A lot of nighttime bars one block away

title: Outstanding
text: Liked  · I couldn't ask for more; the place was clean and neat; the staff went beyond, they were extremely helpful, and always attentive to the need. The commute to Central Park is within walking distance, Time Square is less than 5 minute's train ride.

title: Good one!
text: One of the best staffs I've met, they are soo helpful and polite! Good location, nice rooms, price included breakfast. The breakfast was nice, though I would add some boiled eggs or cheese 😃  I'd recommend

title: Outstanding Service!
text:
I was a walk-in and only stood one night but the manager, Odalis, was so polite and helpful! Even when I felt I was asking stupid questions, he had no problem with helping me!

When I waited for my ride, upon check out, he kept me company and did not make me feel awkward at all! He even got me a cup of coffee while I waited. The service is amazing and the rooms are so nice!

title: Great people to stay with...
text:
I visited this place in March and stayed in Superior room number 607. This room is with a balcony but it is at the back of the hotel. Stayed here for 7 days. 

Room is nice and clean, so is the bathroom with the bathtub. All normal amenities available in the room. The best part about this hotel is their terrace which gives an awesome view of New York skyline.

Breakfast is complimentary but it is the same stuff everyday. I got bored eating the same for 7 days. They should include more variety and specially include some warm breakfast like eggs. 

The entire staff right from the reception to the room service are always with a smile and very helpful to guide you around New York. Would love to visit again.

title: We loved our stay at the Lex!
text: I stayed at the Lex Hotel with my sister in the beginning of March and we had such a good stay! The rooms are very specious and the bathroom is really big! The bed sleeps really good & we had a great view of the city! The breakfast was really fresh and delicious. We loved going up to the rooftop and enjoy the beautiful view of Manhattan during the day and evening as the hotel is located at a really good spot in the city! We will definitely come back again!

title: Excellent Service
text: Very pleased with my stay at The Lex, friendly staff and very clean facilities. I went on a business trip and the flatiron district was perfect location. I would definitely recommend and will be back soon.

title: Love the Lex!
text: I've stayed at this hotel three times now, and recommend it. It's super convenient. The best thing about it is the staff. Anytime I've called or emailed, I've gotten a helpful, quick response. Same when I need anything once I'm there. They give you a handout with local information when you check in. I also love the breakfast; it's not fancy, but it's nice to grab a bowl of cereal on my way out. All three rooms were different and some are bigger than others. Two out of the three had a slight BO smell, but that's a minor negative considering all of the positives.

title: GREAT EXPERIENCE !
text:
Nice hotel, modern rooms, comfy bed and a quiet, comfortable sleep. Convenient location close to subway, and of course tons of places within walking distance.Staff are very helpful, specially >>>
Thank you to General Menager  Mr.Odalis  for  his courtesy  !  Will be back soon ! 
One of the best hotels in NYC !

title: Très bien
text:
Personnel très accueillant et souriant.
Les chambres ne sont pas très grandes mais c'est largement suffisant.
Service de bagagerie gratuit pour laisser les valises avant d'aller dans un autre hôtel le soir 👌
Le petit déjeuner est servi dans le hall d'accueil, il n'y a pas toujours de la place. Contenu du pdj relativement sommaire de notre point de vue de Français pour qui le petit déj est une institution 😂 (café /thé/jus d'orange et muffins /croissants/céréales). Mais tout de même très bien pour manger un petit quelque chose rapidement avant de partir en vadrouille, je recommande 👍

title: Nice people but the hotel is not at the level
text:
Starting to say that people at the reception were very kind. 
Anyhow the room is not great, poorly designed, lots of noise, bathroom was small with a tub and not a stand up shower.
Obviously the position is very central, so that is a plus but for sure a 2/3 stars hotel maximum.

title: Clever,chic,neat decor-wonderful staff-pleasant stay!
text: Just in case you might desire this, ask for a view. Not all rooms have one. Other than my strange window-to-roof equipment, penned in with the facades of other buildings with little of even the sky, the room was super clean, elegant bathroom, fully supplied with extras. The staff are friendly+ and offer all the help one could want to everything from the shower- nozzle function to a nice policy of a small fee to hold one's luggage, something I have looked for in other hotels. I would stay here again. The continental breakfast ( taste croissants) is done up perfectly for a cozy stay feeling as welcome as it gets!

title: Wonderful Boutique Hotel for Value
text: Found this online. Wildly surprised! Hotel and rooms very clean. Staff was unbelievably nice and helpful. Also, it was very quite. The rooftop has a beautiful view. Continental breakfast in morning. If you need more, a deli is next door, and a brunch restaurant is only 2 blocks away. For a boutique hotel this is definitely 5 stars

title: Needed a secluded peaceful place to stay for the weekend.
text: I arrived in NYC early Friday morning, via Amtrak from Washington D.C. During my stay at this wonderful low key spot right next to the University, i really enjoyed my solo trip. If you’re 420 friendly there’s a nice dispensary right next door. Very convenient, more convenient than CVS. Rooftop very quiet and relaxing, long story short, once i come back to NYC i will make another reservation at the LEX boutique Hotel NYC. Stay here, you will enjoy. Train gets you anywhere you want, want to see Times Square? Take the R or N train to 42nd st. Views as well!

title: Really Nice Rooms with Wonderful Staff
text:
Clean, well-appointed rooms, reasonably priced, with one of the nicest hotel staffs in NYC! I had come to NYC to take care of my sister after she’d had an accident—it was easier to take care of her in adjoining rooms rather than at her place. The staff was extremely helpful all the way through—even when  it turned out the hospital wanted to keep her longer and I had to do some rapid rescheduling. Chris, Romeo, Patrick, and Odalis (the General Manager) really went out of their way not only honor my requests but also to come up with new ways they could help me more.
Also: The standard rooms are bigger than most standard NYC hotel rooms. The continental breakfast is great and the rooftop area is really nice. It’s central to everything I wanted to get to and lots of little restaurants around. This was my first time here and I’m definitely coming back.

title: My New Favorite!
text: The Lex Boutique Hotel is a reasonably priced, nicely furnished clean and safe hotel.  The staff is so very friendly and helpful.  Rooms are adequate: small like most NYC hotels and modestly furnished.  Breakfast pastries were a welcome morning addition, and the coffee was very good.  My bed was comfortable -- I slept very well.  I highly recommend The Lex for it's location, cleanliness and wonderful staff.

title: HELLO EVERYONE !! I Was in NYC  and I stay at LEX HOTEL for my 4 * time . Great HOTEL WITH WELCOME STAFF!!
text:
HELLO EVERYONE!! I WANTED TO RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL ! If u want to feel COZY like a home and be CLOSE to EVERYTHING WHAT U NEED IN NYC go to 👉🏻👉🏻 LEX HOTEL NICE STUFF , CLEAN , QUIET and walkable to EVERYWHERE ! BEST STAFF and 
Special thank you General Menager Mr. Odalis! 
Very professional and welcome ! Great experience with this hotel !  Best Regards ! Def. Coming back :)

title: Fall visit
text:
Staff extremely friendly and accommodating. Loved the location and price was very reasonable. 

The room was comfortable and I felt safe despite the fact that we were in the ground floor. We also needed to check our luggage before and after check-in/check-out which they happily did for us.

title: Amazing stay!
text: Amazing and helpful staff to answer all your questions! Bed was cozy, room was very clean, bathroom was clean and chic. We were able to leave our luggage and explore the city before our room was ready. Definitely recommend staying here for your next trip to NYC!

title: Great location, accommodation, and staff.
text:
Great location, great accommodation. Staff were great. Romeo was especially very helpful! Light breakfast provided.  Uber cost one way to LaGuardia is about $55-60 USD. Don’t hesitate to book here. 
-Jay E. from Toronto

title: Great staff
text:
The best thing about the hotel are the front desk attendants (very helpful and friendly) and the location.
The hotel itself is clean, but not up-kept. There are definitely big visible stains on all the carpets (in hallway and in room). The rooftop was blah... the fence was so high that all you can really see is the sky, not the area around the hotel. Breakfast was included but really basic (plain croissant and muffins and bad coffee), I went out for breakfast after the first day. 
For the price in the area it makes sense, I'd stay again because of the people working there.
Last thing, when getting a taxi to the airport which they have a button for through the taxi company so it arrives right away, I asked the front desk what the flat rate was to JFK was and was told $52. The taxi driver charged me $68 flat rate. So I don't know why the discrepancy but someone needs to update the info or the taxi drivers are scamming people if that is the negotiated rate with the hotel. I wanted to let the hotel know but they don't have an email address available on their website and I'm not the calling to complain type. It sucks though.

title: Great Hotel and location
text:
The hotel was chosen for location to family in NY but its also great for subway and short walk to 5th Avenue etc

Staff were all friendly and although we did not need to ask them many questions I’m sure would have been very helpful 

I would choose this hotel again if we revisit family

title: Charming hotel
text:
The room is very nice and the bed is comfortable. It is pretty calm.
People at the reception are very nice.
The hotel is near the metro Line, si it is very practicle to visit New York. 
I highly recommend!

title: Exceptional Customer Service
text: This was my second visit to the Lex Hotel. The first had a few hiccups, but the front office manager Patrick assured me that it was an anomaly. He was right. My second visit was phenomenal. The front desk staff (Romeo, Catherine, and Chris) whom I interacted with on this visit were welcoming and made an effort to ensure my stay was wonderful. And so it was. Incredible customer service here that goes above and beyond many other places.

title: Very nice hotel
text: Very kind staff, hotel is right in the middle of city so you can walk it or take bus or subways. Would definitely recommend. Also provide complimentary breakfast and free water bottle. Price is very reasonable.

title: Stay at The Lex
text: Our stay was awesome! Romeo was so kind and helpful. He got us checked in right away, made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed, and even gave us tips and advice for navigating the city. The roof top was awesome and made for great pics, memories, and beautiful weather to enjoy our breakfast! They can also get you a cab at a push of a button within 5 minutes! Very convenient and so close to the hustle and bustle, but quiet enough to enjoy a good night of sleep in a comfy bed. Would definitely recommend and will be back!

title: Not the best experience
text: 3 nights in this hotel. Pros: Great location, the staff were extremely friendly. Cons: the room feels out of date, even dirty. I stayed there for 3 nights and my room never cleaned, I never got even fresh towels.

title: Nice cozy hotel, wonderful staff
text: It's hard to find a budget-friendly hotel in NYC.  The cost for the cozy queen room at this hotel was relatively good in comparison to others in the area at the time we traveled.  Upon arrival, the hotel is small but nicely maintained.  The free breakfast is decent.  The staff is absolutely wonderful.  Very friendly and helpful.  A nice place to come back to at the end of the day.  We would stay here again.

title: Excellent Service
text: Had a great experience at Lex Hotel, NY.  Romeo was very courteous and professional.  Rates are reasonable and breakfast was great.  The location in Manhattan was close to all major attractions.  Will stay again next time.

title: One of the best places I’ve stayed in NYC
text: I don’t usually write reviews but this hotel had the nicest staff. First when I booked I found a price cheaper and they matched it without question. We arrived early in the morning and they held our luggage. The parking was awesome!!! Great rate and you can access your car at any time! It was like a vending machine of cars. Overall our room was very clean and it was a great location as we dropped our daughter off for college. They offered a complimentary breakfast and had a really cute rooftop patio that was open all day. We will definitely be back for our future stays!

title: Great value for money
text: Spacious room, friendly desk staff, great location. Plenty of nearby restaurants. Easy walk to Gramercy Square, which, though you can't go into it, is nice to look at. It's hard to find a room with en suite bathroom at this price range.

title: GREAT HOTEL IN ♥️OF NYC!!!
text: Would like to thank the entireLEX  team for making my stay very cozy and comfortable  and very feel like a home, special thanks to General menager -Odalis -   Who made our my stay memorable by his courties! The rooms are NICE and CLEAN , quiet and really cozy ! walking distance to everything you need in NYC ! I use to live there for to many years and I can tell you that If u stay in LEX hotel you are close to EVERYTHING you need to see in NYC !😍 don’t think to book it just do it .. Right choose ! Go ahead !

title: Great little landing pad
text: We came for an overnight date, and had a great time. The room was clean and simple and quiet, and the staff was very nice. The location is great, and so is the price. Perfect little landing pad in the city.

title: Good value hotel in great location
text:
Value for money is very good - given it is in a central location in Manhattan, if you have reasonable expectations you could do a lot worse. 

The staff were excellent - very friendly and check in efficient and quick. Complimentary breakfast was basic but appreciated. Room was not huge, and no view, but I have found this frequently in New York including when I have paid a lot more. 

I would definitely stay again as it is walking distance to the office I work at, and easy to get around the city from there.

title: Better than expected for the money
text: Perfect spot to sleep and go , clean , nice like new , front window , free street parking across the street , the staff super nice and friendly , most affordable in Manhattan , will go back no doubt !, restaurants steps away , perfect location for the money .

title: Wonderful Place to Stay in NYC at a Good Price!
text: I booked a stay at the Lex so as to be closer to a friend who lived in the neighborhood. My three nights at the hotel did not disappoint! The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the overall vibe was great and added an exclamation point to my recent trip to NYC. Odalis checked me in and was really helpful; later when I was in search of ice to help my friends better enjoy the rooftop view, he was quick to have a bucket of ice sent to my room. The rooftop itself was a highlight of my Lex experience, as I spent mornings and two evenings looking out along the picturesque view along Lexington Avenue which stretches as far as the Chrysler Building. Getting on a train is easy, as there's a subway stop on nearby 23rd, or if you don't mind a quick walk, Union Square is close by. Gramercy Park is just down the street, and midtown and Brooklyn are just minutes away by train. Great food/drink experiences abound as well nearby. The only negative (and it's not a deal breaker as the staff will promptly send you ice as stated before) is that the rooms don't have refrigerators. But overall, I was beyond impressed with The Lex and I will look to stay there again in the near future.

title: Great stay but haven’t gotten deposit back
text: Great stay, staff we’re extremely friendly. Perfect location to walk everywhere, reasonably sized room with a balcony. But the hotel is unreachable post-stay, and I am not able to contact them to get my deposit released from their side.

title: The best hotel in NYC!
text: Lex hotel is the best hotel in New York City. Perfect location, clean and spacious rooms, amazing breakfast and most importantly a great staff always willing to go the extra mile. Guests feel welcome, it’s home away from home. Highly recommend!!!

title: Great stay at the Lex
text: We had a wonderful experience at the LEX Hotel NYC because of your staff.  Everyone was wonderful, helpful, professional and warm.  We really enjoyed Odalis.  ODALIS   MADE ALL THE DIFFERENCE IN OUR STAY FOR US.  Thank you.

title: Very clean and nice hotel with great staff
text: I stayed at Lex Hotel in June 2022 for a solo trip and it was a great experience. I felt very safe as a solo traveler and enjoyed the central location of the hotel. The staff was excellent, especially the general manager Odalis, who was very attentive, welcoming and made sure that every special requests I came with, was made possible. I can highly recommend this hotel and will  definitely return to this hotel for my next trip to NYC.

title: This is my safe harbor hotel in a busy city
text: When flights were cancelled at LaGuardia due to storms, this hotel was a safe haven for me.  It was recommended by a friend who lives just round the corner.  I felt like the management, guided by Odalis, was so helpful and accommodating.  I live in the Midwest and was trying to get home to Omaha.  I was not familiar with this area of the city and everyone at The Lex reached out to answer questions and also ask if I needed anything.  They are the most helpful staff I've run across in a long time at a hotel.

title: Great hotel, convenient location
text:
We stayed in the Lex Hotel for a week and then three additional days. When our flight was cancelled amidst nationwide air traffic collapse on June 16, we booked the Lex again and Odalis at the checkin gave us a free upgrade of the room. The rooms and beds are comfortable. So much so that we usually overslept the breakfast. The staff is helpful and not overbearing. We did not use rooftop space much because we were out and about most of the time, but we did check it out and it is great in the summer for hanging out. 

Location is great. Greenwich Village, SoHo, Chinatown, Little Italy are all within walking distance. Times Sq and Central Park are a few subway stops away. It is also easy to get to Brooklyn using N or Q trains and we used this opportunity often.

title: Affordable, comfortable stay in the heart of NYC
text:
We’d been let down by a hotel on the day we arrived in New York but were fortunate that The Lex had rooms. 
From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed by friendly, helpful staff, we had a comfortable and well air conditioned room with an excellent shower, and the new roof terrace was a lovely addition to the hotel. Excellent stay and would choose to stay here again.

title: Huge, clean rooms, warm-hearted and super helpful staff
text: The check-in and check-out process were smooth and pleasant. The staff is super friendly and helpful. I loved the complementary breakfast and bottles of water. Overall, it's the best budget-friendly hotel in Manhattan. I loved the central location, and the huuuuge room and bathroom.

title: Great little hotel  and staff!
text: I stayed for five nights and it felt like home by the end of the week. The staff were always kind and helpful . Odalis and his staff were awesome! The Cozy room was cozy but clean with nice decor. Great location and subway was within walking distance.

title: GREAT HOTEL WITH GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE !! CLEAN AND COMFORTABLE !! 5****
text: THE HOTEL IT’S CERY CLEAN AND COMFORTABLE , has. BALCONY -BIG PLUS!! Customer service is great and specially FRONT DESK !! :) Odalis was great and very welcome and polite ! 5 * for this place !  Don’t think twice to book it , Great place for stay in NYC CLOSE TO EVERYTHING IN ❤️ Of NYC !

title: Highly recommend this hotel in the flatiron district of NYC.
text:
This hotel and staff especially Mr. Odalis Garcia, the General Manager and his front desk staff/housekeeping/engineering are super knowledgeable, helpful and have made my stay very accommodating since I had to evacuate my apartment in the neighborhood. 

The complimentary coffee is by far the best coffee. 

In the Spring, they have a beautiful roof top garden with spectacular views of the NYC skyline. I highly recommend this boutique hotel on your next visit to NYC.

title: Great hotel and STAFF!
text: My husband and I visited Lex Boutique Hotel earlier this month and  had the most pleasant experience. The room was clean, and the staff was awesome. One in particular, Joselin was friendly, kind, and made me feel comfortable and welcome. She was helpful and was also very knowledgeable about the city. I look forward to staying at the hotel the next time I am in NYC.

title: disappointed with our stay
text: **We were told the rooftop was available"  the week before we arrived When we checked in the rooftop was "UNDER RENOVATION"   That made me so mad. However,  the staff was friendly and rooms were very clean.  We reserved two rooms.  #1 Double suite (2 queen beds) and room #2 with queen and "balcony".    Rooms were clean but room #2 felt like a dungeon.  Window in the room overlooked a window well that had been covered with bamboo curtain.  Room #2 was a joke with a balcony **** DONT pay extra to stay in the balcony"  It overlooks garbage courtyard and 2 massive water towers.  BALCONY ROOM WAS A JOKE>  Save your money.  BREAKFAST was  cold pastries.  Adequate but will stay somewhere else next time.

title: Awesome, of course I’ll back!
text: Cleanness, good bed, bathroom pretty cleaned and good, there is shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, soaps, all good! A good hotel to stay with family and friends, I’m happy to be here in my days at New York

title: 10 out of 10 experience
text: After reading the reviews about the Lex, I decided to book a few days. This quaint boutique hotel was everything I was hoping for. From the welcoming checkin, the beautiful decor and immaculate room, and friendly helpful staff, I couldn’t have asked for more. I rate this hotel a 10 out of 10!

title: Awesomeness
text: The Lex hotel was absolutely amazing the staff was so friendly and welcoming and everything was so clean. The free breakfast option in the morning is great to have before a stroll around the city and it’s location is great! Super close to the Empire State Building and easy to get anywhere because of its Proximity to train station.

title: Almost Great.
text: There is a lot great about this boutique hotel but there were some serious problems too. The staff is super friendly and it is obvious they are trying their hardest but the bottom line is that things fall through the cracks. The location is good, the staff is nice and the property itself is quite well put together but the check-in took forever and nothing was ever done to address the issue. Apparently, there was a housekeeping issue, which is understandable but not getting a room for hours with just a sorry is not. I really hope they figure themselves out because it is a potentially excellent hotel.

title: Great service! Great location!
text: Affordable and comfortable. The service was 5 stars. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed several days and enjoyed my time. Not flashy but that’s ok. It’s simple. Lex boutique hotel offers good prices for good rooms and quality service.  * things to note no mini fridge in room but I asked them to hold a bottle of wine and they kept it cold and ready upon request. Complementary bottle(s) of water tho!

title: Terrible Stay / Horrible Check in
text:
When I arrived at the hotel, the lobby was in chaos, there were about 20 people all waiting to check in and the hotel had lost their reservations and to top it off, there were no rooms for most.  I had to be at a dinner reservation and a show  at 5:30 pm.  Only by being particularly, assertive and  hovering over the desk staff did I get any attention.  I guess I was one of the "lucky" ones since I have made the reservation at the hotel website, instead of Booking.com. (this people were sent across town to other hotels.   Finally at the last possible minute when I was ready to go to my friends hotel, did they find a room.

The weekend progressed and I was happy to leave.  I got home (beginning of december 2021) and noticed I was not charged.  Hallelujah, they made up for it.  WRONG.  I was just charged 2 months later without notice and when I called they had nothing to offer except come stay again and we will give you a discount.... WHY WOULD I DO THAT????

title: Hey! You have to be hosted there!
text: The most friendly and thoughtful costumer services in NYC! I'm satisfy and thankful with everything there. The location is great and accessful for train stations, close of Madison Square Park, Flatiron Building, bars, restaurants, laudry, grocery stores, and many attractions super close. The Hotel is comfortable, cozy and I feel like at home! My recommendation without doubt! LEX HOTEL is FIVE STARS in quality and generous price! Do not think twice!

title: Great location and well looked after at the Lex
text: Lovely boutique hotel, great location and COVID safety protocols. Friendly staff. Nice continental breakfast and happy hour. Blackout blinds, decent size rooms, super comfy pillows and bed near a wide variety of restaurants. Highly recommend.

title: Visitor
text: Venimos para pasar el cumpleaños de mi esposo en New York y reservamos en el Hotel Lex,nos recibió Odalis García General Manager,quiero destacar que hace muy bien su labor es muy Amable,atento,profesional,y siempre pendiente a las necesidades del cliente,Recomiendo que Reserven aquí y pregunten por Odalis García

title: DO NOT STAY HERE (December 2021 stay = awful)
text: As review title says, DO NOT STAY HERE. There is no value in this hotel, and the claim of a "boutique" experience is N/A in every sense of the word. While the staff try and be helpful, they have an excuse for every failure and misgiving this property has to offer…it's a mess (both physically and operationally). They've "just reopened" but their booking system isn't intact and doesn't sync with providers like Hotels.com, so they overbook and then claim to have to walk you to another hotel. When you complain, they magically find a room. Their phone system doesn't work, they are unable to issue receipts/folios, and (while polite) their staff is wildly undertrained and woefully unprofessional for a hotel experience in NYC. I've stayed a plenty…this experience is bare bones and bottom of the barrel. The room is compact (normal by NYC standards), but is drab and dowdy with scratchy linens, dirty bathrooms, and carpet stained beyond repair. Pay the extra $50 and get a hotel you'll feel comfortable and safe in…one you won't have to stay up late writing a terrible review on. DO NOT STAY HERE.

title: Good location
text: Hotel is very well situated. You can walk anywhere from there. Rooms are on the small side. Nice restaurant on the top floor. Checkin very smooth. Rooms very clean, perfect for a 2 night trip. Standard Nyc hotel

title: Friendly and welcoming
text:
This was 2nd time visit to nyc, and so pleased I found this hotel .arrived on fri to be greeted with a glass of wine(5-6pm free cheese and wine) to be then told we had been upgraded to a junior suite !!!one very happy daughter as now didn’t have to share a bed with mum .. the room was huge for New York , a sofa , flat scene tv, lovely large bathroom .okay there was no view but who comes to sit in your room. Breakfast was pastries, porridge,cereals and juice and tea and coffee enough to set you up for the day. There is a roof top terrace for warmer weath
ALL the staff were friendly , nothing was too much trouble from printing subway instructions to confirming transfers for us. Brilliant location in the middle of uptown/downtown close subway stations and plenty of places to eat ..couldn’t fault anything ..would def stay here agin ..

title: New York visit
text: We visited the lex boutique back in 2018 we found it to be a extremely welcoming hotel and extremely friendly that serves a continental breakfast on the rooftop weather permitting and free cheese and wine reception every evening between 5 & 6 . Ok the room we had was the smallest they had but it’s no problem as we were out every day .we were so impressed with the place and with the promise from the manager next visit we will get a better room we booked to go back again this summer and we both can’t wait already

title: Great stay!!
text: This hotel has everything you want to have an exceptional stay. The staff is excellent and ready to assist at all times. The size of the rooms are NYC standard but most importantly they are exceptionally Clean. Will definitely return again.

title: Nos encantó
text:
Este hotel por precio calida y ubicación es muy recomdable.

Su personal es muy atento y coordial. Nos servián cafe y té en cualquier momento y hata un vaso de jugo de naranja para la nena. A su vez de 17 a 18 hs tienen degustación de vinos gratis.

Lo único para criticar es que el aire frío calor hacía ruido y el desayuno se sirve en la recepción.

title: Outstanding service, great deal
text: Staying at the Lex made my trip to NYC one of the smoothest and most pleasant I've had. From the location to the customer service this hotel is a gem! A staff member (whose name begins with R, I forgot sorry!) checked me in and upgraded my room for free so I could get in early. The hotel had all the amenities I wanted and ordering coffee/tea to the room was so easy and quick - much better than the typical in-room hotel coffeemakers. Honestly an amazing value and find.

title: Adding another voice to the chorus...
text: Just back from a terrific week in New York and a great stay at the Lex. I was looking for a hotel with breakfast but on a budget in the city, and that's quite hard to find, but the Lex certainly delivers. And not only breakfast but also that daily wine reception. As others have said, the staff here are excellent (special shout out to Gam!). It's perhaps not in the most glamorous area of the city, but it is well connected with several subway stations within easy walking distance, which made getting back for a rest (and that glass of wine!) between daytime and evening plans pretty easy. Comfortable bed, large (for NYC) room, bathroom with a tub and shower and plenty of hot water. Wi-fi worked wherever I was in the building. Could not fault the Lex!

title: Hôtel extra
text: Hôtel agréable dans une rue calme, appréciable à New-York. Personnel très gentil et souriant. Très bien situé proche du métro et de divers centres d'intérêts. La chambre était propre et confortable avec tout à disposition. Le petit déjeuner est compris se qui permet de faire quelques économie. Il est fourni, viennoiserie, fruit, céréales. Possibilité d'avoir toute la journée de l'eau, café, thé à disposition.

title: Excelente experiencia!
text: Hotel con muy buena ubicación, a pocos minutos de varias estaciones de metro. Lugar muy limpio y personal muy atento. Lo único que trataría de mejorar un poquito sería la variedad del desayuno que siempre consistía en café, zumo de naranja, cereales, fruta y bollaría.

title: Lex Hotel
text:
Although quite small . they were extremely polite and extremely clean . I was extremely pleased with their staff they were courteous polite and kind ..
they told us the sites to see , they instructed us on what mode of transportation to use . And they were always kind and always helpful Even when we left late in the day the always obliged us in cleaning the room

title: Excellent séjour au LEX Hôtel
text:
Excellent accueil (avec mention particulière pour Roméo) et très bon séjour au sein d'un hôtel très bien placé dans Manhattan (proximité du métro) et assurant un service de qualité. C'est propre, sobre, bien équipé et on s'y sent bien. Le petit bémol (je dis bien petit) est à mettre au petit-déjeuner (très bon et suffisant avec de bonnes viennoiseries au demeurant) mais qui se prend dans le hall d'accueil sur un tabouret au comptoir et derrière la baie vitrée pour certains (mais on est aux USA ...) 
J'y retournerai certainement.

title: Queijos e vinhos de 17h00 até 18h00.
text: O Lex Boutique Hotel é bem localizado e oferece queijos e vinhos de 17h00 às 18h00 como cortesia, todos os dias. Aproveitei uma única vez durante os 5 dias que me hospedei lá. Achei que os vinhos seriam californianos, mas para minha surpresa o tinto era espanhol e o branco era chileno. A única coisa que eu não gostei no hotel foi o local em que é servido o café da manhã. Ele é servido no saguão aonde há poucas cadeiras e infelizmente pegamos pessoas mal educadas que terminavam de comer mas permaneciam sentadas, atrapalhando quem estava de pé aguardando.

title: Amazing hotel and even more amazing staff!
text: I stumbled upon this hidden gem on a weekend get away to the city. From the second I walked in, I felt welcome. I arrived earlier than check in time. They stored my luggage.Called me when room was ready and sent my luggage to the room. The rooms are exactly what you would expect from NY as far as size. The room was very clean and staff maintained it as such.  Check in was fast. I love that I can get coffee at anytime of day. Enjoyed their daily wine and cheese event. Breakfast was simple , but had everything you needed to get your day started. Rooftop is very nice. Can't wait to see it in the summer time. Staff is super friendly and always greet you with a warm smile. They are very helpful with directions. Hotel is very close to a lot of attractions and great food. I will definitely stay there again when I return to  NYC.

title: Delightful boutique hotel, great value
text: This boutique hotel offered a delightful stay. We stayed in a standard room (the cozy room is smaller, other room categories are larger), and it was plenty big enough, clean and comfortable. The location was great for us. The continental breakfast featured fresh, not prepackaged, baked goods. The real jewel in the crown was the staff. Everyone we encountered, from front desk staff to housekeeping, seemed to really like their job and take pleasure in being helpful, friendly, kind, and cheerful, and wanted to make sure you enjoyed your stay. Add to that a reasonable price and this charming hotel is a big winner.

title: Good value, reasonable location
text:
Reasonably priced hotel . Decent room size and finishing. One of the gentleman who mans the reception who I think is a manager provides friendly and helpful service but that is not replicated for all reception staff.

Location is alright but not that central but has restaurants / cafes around.

Breakfast is a rather casual affair- pastries , fruits and beverage served at the small  reception area which has some scattered seating

A decent place to stay for the pricing

title: Mycket trevligt hotell centralt på Manhattan
text: Vi kan varmt rekommendera Lex Hotel på Lexington avenue i New York. Litet hotell med hög standard och mycket bra service. Continental frukost ingår. Rummen är moderna och håller hög klass. Rent och fint, städningen är mycket bra!

title: A great stay, a great hotel
text:
How glad I am to have chosen Lex boutique hotel NYC for this year's NYC visit.
It is a small, clean and super friendly hotel located in a really nice and not too busy neighbothood, with EVERYTHING you need right outside the hotel's doors.

We were not familiar with the neighborhood but found everything we wanted within reach. 

Our ropm was exactly what we wanted and we felt so good to be returning there after a busy day or night in the city.

We specifically loved the continental breakfast, which was simple but very satisfying (pastery, coffy, cereals, juice, oats and some fruit) and the cheese and wine they serve in the afternoon. This really shows they care about guest's satisfaction and really want to make sure your stay is nice and fun.

The LEX really live up to my moto of Keep it simple and do it with a smile!

title: Not worth the price
text: My wife and i found the rooms absurdly cramped, badly furnished- no desk, no chairs , a bed that consumes over 50% of the entire room space and no closets. Moreover, no views and a cramped bathroom with no tub. Need i say more?

title: Incredible
text: From the moment I walked into the hotel, I felt at home and welcomed. The room though small was clean and well appointed as is the bathroom. The location is perfect as it's not in busy Times Square and yet there are restaurants, shopping and attractions nearby. The front desk staff couyldn't have been more friendly and accomadating bring tea to the room if requested. I have already booked my next stay there.

title: Wonderful boutique hotel on Lexington
text: This was our second stay at the Lex. The location is excellent and very convenient for so many things NYC. The hotel is small like all boutique hotels in NYC, however, it’s service packs a punch. The staff is friendly and very accommodating and the managers are very pleased to help with anything that the competent staff can’t. The rooms are clean and convenient. I will stay here again anytime I’m in the area. Thank you team Lex.

title: Wedding anniversary visit to NYC
text: Checking in at The Lex NYC could not have been easier made by friendly staff. Our room on the 5th floor was quiet with very little street noise, although the air conditioner was a little on the noisy side (nothing that we are not used to room air con in the UK). Hotel is perfectly located in mid town giving easy access to uptown and downtown with subway stop only a block away. Breakfast is continental style saving time in the morning, one slight improvement could be coffee in reception throughout the day (water is available). On checking out the hotel willingly stored our bags until ready to depart for the airport. Excellent hotel, great location and wonderfully friendly staff.

title: Superb Stay
text: It has a fabulous staff and the daily continental breakfast comes in the clutch. Also, the wine reception hit the spot after I came in from work. Akheim, at the front desk was amazing. He was very courteous and polite. He also listened to me Talk his ear off after a few glasses of wine . . Lol . He was great with giving directions and food suggestions. The room was comfy. The rooftop is also a place you should check out when you stay at the hotel. The view from the rooftop is amazing. Overall stay was superb.

title: Small rooms, no breakfast, noisy
text: Stayed for 3 nights during UN assembly. Everythibg was sold out so had no choice. The room is small, boring. No brekafast ( some fruits and cakes in the lobby). My room on 2 floor was very noisy due to the view on Lexington and the AC was blowing at the bed. Terrible. But location is ok

title: Had everything we needed
text:
I stayed here for 4 nights with my girlfriend, it was exactly what we needed, we didn't want super fancy or a big room, we wanted clean cozy, comfortable and safe, this was all of those things. The continental breakfast is pastries, cereals,  fruit, juices, a great way to start the morning. We were always out in the evenings so we didn't get the wine reception at night. The staff was great, really friendly and went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of. Our flight was leaving later in the afternoon and they let us keep our luggage there while we went and got lunch. 
The room was cleaned daily with clean towels and the bed made, we were always greeted with a smile and asking how our day had been. 
I'd definitely stay there again.

title: Girls Getaway
text:
I stayed with my friends this past Labor Day weekend and we had an excellent experience. The front desk were so courteous, the rooms were so clean and everything was ready when we arrived. 

We would definitely stay at this hotel when we visit New York again.

title: Ottimo hotel
text: Hotel in posizione ottima per visitare New York, pulizia impeccabile e ottima colazione inclusa nel prezzo. Personale molto disponibile e gentilissimo.Nelle vicinanze c’è ampia scelta di ristoranti ,pub e birrerie dove poter mangiare bene.

title: From now on MY TO GO PLACE IN MANHATTAN
text: The ideal place to stay when you visit New York City! I traveled with my girlfriend and the location seemed perfect and it is but this hotel has the friendliest staff, great rooms with awesome beds, amazing rooftop and delicious breakfast!

title: Great Hotel
text: Me and my sister stayed at the Lex Hotel when we visited New York in March. Our room wasn’t ready when we arrived, but we were allowed to use the bathroom to freshen up and were offered coffee. We were impressed with our room, it was more roomy than we expected it to be and it was also nice and clean. The staff were friendly and very helpful. Although the hotel isn’t close by to the Times Square, Empire State, etc., you are only around a 15/20 minute walk away. Plus it’s also nice to stay somewhere that’s just a little out of the way from all the hustle and bustle of NY.

title: Bewertung
text: Wir sind sehr zufrieden mit dem Hotel mit sauber und ruhigen Zimmer. Sehr nettes und hilfsbereites Personal, kostenlose Frühstück , gute Lage. Die Dachterasse ist seh schön und bietet einen tollen Blick. Empfehlenswert.

title: Cozy cute and boutique-y, great location
text: I liked my stay! It’s in a great location near Madison square park, flatiron but also walking distance to gramercy and east village. I especially enjoyed the wine and cheese happy hour FREE from 5-6 pm. As for the rooms, they are a good value for money. Comfortable beds, small rooms but did include everything you need - toiletries, complimentary water, large bed, tables and a desk. There are no frills but for the price, location and some free wine I left my 3 night stay happy as a clam! Not getting 5 stars because not over and beyond, but still great.

title: The Lex is a gem of a mid-priced hotel.
text:
The Lex is a cool little boutique hotel with clean quiet rooms.  They have a lot of cool little things for guests like happy hour on the rooftop patio and breakfast there as well, weather permitting.  The rooms are average sized for Manhattan, but above-average quality and cleanliness.  
The staff here is awesome.  They seemed to really care about making a good impression and ensuring guests were enjoying their time there.

title: Brilliant! Look no further!
text:
We were travelling to NYC as a group. This hotel is in the perfect location, moments from the subway, easy to get anywhere.
The biggest selling point of this hotel are the staff, they could not have been more helpful, more friendly, more hospitable, a real asset for this hotel.  Thank you to everyone there.
We requested a room with a shower, rather than just a bath, which they obliged.
The room was lovely, well appointed.
At 4pm they served complimentary cheese and wine in reception, such a nice touch.
The continental breakfast was lovely and served on the fantastic roof terrace.
We were all surprised at the good value of this place for all the amenities and location.
Keep doing what you’re doing, we’ll be back! Your staff are a credit, make sure they stay!

title: Would highly recommend  this Hotel.
text: Stayed at the Lex hotel for 5 nights for our time in New York. The Hotel was small but very clean. Breakfast on the rooftop was good with a good variety for continental breakfast. Enjoyed the free wine, crackers and cheese between 5 and 6pm.. Great location. Easy access to sub way.

title: Lex Boutique
text: Great staff, great location, well appointed rooms.  Also free breakfast, not much selection but adequate, and free wine, cheese and crackers in the late afternoon.  I will absolutely stay here again.  The hallways are not noisy, and I even had a private balcony on my last stay.

title: Average Hotel but for the money you can find better
text:
My boyfriend and I stayed at the Lex over Easter Weekend. I had seen other reviews on TripAdvisor and seen pictures so I felt assured that our stay would be good. We arrived early morning and dropped off our bags that the hotel. They said they would call us as soon as they had a room ready. Around 4:30 pm I had still not received any call so I called the front desk and the man on the phone said he forgot to call us to tell us the room was ready. Once we checked in, the room was OKAY. It had a faint mildew smell and the AC unit was extremely noisy and made the air super dry. I was not expecting a super large space or anything so I do not mark them negatively on this. It had all the basic amenities you would expect; hair dryer, towels etc. The mattress and bedding felt super warm at night, coupled with the shoddy AC, it made sleeping pretty difficult and I felt sweaty most of the night. 

The one thing that really stood out to me negatively was the bar soaps and shampoos. I do not know why but when I used their products, my skin started to itch immediately and I began to develop small rashes. I looked at the back of the products and it wrote "Made in China" alongside many ingredients that looked strange to be in bathroom products. I would really hope that even when cutting costs, this area they could invest more in, because the soaps really made the experience all the worse!

title: Always amazing!
text:
We have now stayed at the Lex over a dozen times during the past few years. We're in NYC for a variety of reasons (business and pleasure) and Lex has become our go to hotel. Our last visit required us to stay for 9 days and the only reason we didn't stay at the Lex the entire time was availability. It's a smaller hotel and although limited by the number of rooms, the quality, attentiveness, friendliness of staff and location make this a top choice in Manhattan.

If you're looking for trendy, you can go down the block and easily spend $100 more a night for staff with an attitude and artisan shampoos and soaps. Compared to the Lex, you'll also get much smaller rooms and limited flexibility with check in and check out.  The Lex staff is nothing short of amazing. Consistently, we are greeted with a sincere smile every time we pass the front desk, and when we need something (extra pillows, late checkout, etc.), they are extremely helpful.

The rooms may lack the hip decor of the Standard or Public, but they are spotless and the beds are always comfortable. Although a boutique hotel, the rooms are big by NYC standards, so we've never felt confined as with other hotels.

Finally, the location is ideal. A short walk to Madison Square Park and the Lower East Side. We can quickly get to SOHO or up to 34th Street in a matter of minutes.

title: Great Place
text: A truly wonderful hotel, great location, walking distance to everything to see in the city. The room was a little small, but that was a non-issue we spent all our time sightseeing and visiting the museums, galleries, restaurants and watering holes.

title: A little gem!
text: A completely unpretentious oasis near Gramercy Park.  Clean, simple and welcoming.  Unlike snootier spots in the city, the staff doesn’t have to work to appear warm, friendly and accommodating because they ARE warm, friendly and accommodating.

title: très très bien
text: Le personnel était super gentil, en particulier Roméo. L'hotel est très bien situé, le déjeuner est fourni ainsi que le 5 à 7. Le lit était confortable et la chambre calme. C'était très propre. Près de Madison Square Park et très central.  Possible de faire beaucoup de choses à pied. près du métro également.

title: Impressive
text: Cozy hotel, clean, big bathrooms, comfortable mattress, close to the Subway station and the staff is friendly and willing to help you. I will stay there again in the future. Affordable price. I highly recommend it.

title: Most accommodating staff ever
text: The staff went so far in being helpful and making the stay so enjoyable. They were so friendly and caring.  The included breakfast was a nice feature. The beds were comfortable. The location was perfect.

title: Fantastic!
text: We stayed for 5 nights at end of March/beginning of April. Flew over from Scotland to celebrate our 35th wedding anniversary. The hotel was clean, modern and the staff (especially Romeo) were friendly, attentive and very helpful throughout our stay. There was even an anniversay card from the hotel when we entered our room - nice personal touch. The location is excellent with numerous eating choices closeby. Access to the subway is only a couple of minutes away. The daily free cheese and wine between 5 and 6 is the icing on the cake. Would definitely recommend!

title: EXCELLENT
text: The hotel is very well kept with a modern look. The location is perfect with plenty of nearby shops as well as transportation. The front desk staff were very attentive and helpful and will go the extra mile. Romeo in particular helped us with directions to get to our destination as well as making us dinner reservations. The cleaning staff were friendly and polite  and kept the room very neat and clean. Thank you all for making our stay memorable and enjoyable and the management for having an excellent property.

title: Wonderful staff, cute hotel!
text: My work signed a contract with Lex for my visits from CA to NY.  I was very happy with my week long visit, the staff was super attentive and although the room was compact it was very tidy and cute.  Akheim and Nitzka were the best!

title: Never A Disappointing Experience
text: I found myself visiting the city once again as a friend was visiting. We stayed at this gem hotel as its my go to hotel when in the city. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly, alway greeting us as if it was the first time interacting with them. The continental breakfast is a great touch to get the morning started. One of the best things about this hotel is the location and how convenient it is to get around the city. Thanks again for the great stay, until next time my Lex Team!

title: 快適
text:
どのスタッフもフレンドリーで親切だったのが凄く好印象でした。チェックアウト後に荷物を預かってもらいましたが、受け取りに行くとさらっとペットボトルのミネラルウォーターを一本くれたのが地味に嬉しかったです(部屋で提供されるものと同じ)
朝食はビュッフェスタイルで、パンは数種類から選べ、フルーツや飲み物も充実していました。ラウンジが少し混雑していたので、部屋に戻っていただきました。

title: Lovely Place
text:
This will be my 2nd time staying at this lovely haven in the Flat Iron district and it will not be my last!
The staff is so friendly and helpful in any and all situations the place is so clean! The Lex hotel is also convenient to many fantastic restaurants and shops... I just cant say enough
about the quality, Impeccable!
If and when you visit be sure and say hello to the lovely Angelika.

title: My go-to hotel in NYC
text: I stay here a couple times a year. Affordable, convenient and clean. Love the staff, always friendly and attentive. The bath products in the room are nice too. The area has tasty cheap food just outside the door, and the hotel is conveniently located to everything you might need.

title: Great hotel in a great location!
text: Stayed here for a few days, definitely a smaller hotel but it was very clean and we had no issues here. The staff is great and friendly, parking is available nearby for an extra fee which was nice to have as an option. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Pequeño pero bien situado
text: Es un hotel pequeño, con habitaciones pequeñas. Si será pequeño que el desayuno lo sirven en la misma recepción del hotel (hay 10 taburetes, si pillas sitio, bien). Lo bueno que tiene es que está muy bien situado, en la avenida lexington con la 26.

title: Fint lille hotel med familiær stemning
text:
Det er altid en overraskelse, at komme til et nyt hotel. Og denne gang havde vi svigermor med på sit først besøg i byen. Sightseeing på 5 var målet.og beliggenheden var perfekt.

Vi blev budt velkommen til hotellet af en meget sød og kompetent yngre dame (det viste sig senere at det var manageren). Hurtigt blev vi tjekket ind. 
Morgenmaden er som den plejer på "Kontinental" og bød på gode Croissanter. Og så er der "happy hour" mellem 17 og 18, hvor hotellet byder på et glas vin med oste til. 
Alt i alt et god bud på et hotel midttown

title: Very small room, terrible water pressure
text: This is probably the smallest hotel room I've ever had outside of Tokyo. The room was very clean, bathroom amenities are nice and the internet, while slow, was solid.  Bed was comfortable but the pillows were very thin and not very comfortable for sleeping. Worst was the shower water pressure and the shower head, along with the low pressure the shower head in my room sprayed it out in such a spray that rinsing off was challenging.  Also, the room only had a small built in desk with an uncomfortable wooden chair. You had that, or the bed as the only options for sitting.  There was no dresser and only a very shallow wardrobe which included a mini ironing board that sits on the bed or floor to use. I appreciate the cleanliness, 2 free bottles of water but the remaining was sub-par in my opinion. I probably won't come back here.

title: Espectacular lugar
text: Desde el primer momento en que llegamos nos sentimos como en casa, excelente ubicación, la atención de primera clase, cada uno de los rincones del lugar gozan de una limpieza y orden si igual, sin duda volvería una y un millón de veces mas.

title: Viagem dos sonhos
text: Hotel aconchegante, bem localizado demais, próximo a estações do metrô, da pra ir a pé ao flatiron building, grand central terminal, entre outros. Vista do empire state building. Quarto pequeno, padrão de NY, mas atendeu bem as expectativas. Super limpo, ameninades de banho tb ótimas. Chá e café disponivel a qualquer momento. Vinhos e queijos toda tarde até 18h disponível para os hóspedes. Café da manha (diferencial em NY) muito satisfatório! Com croissants, muffins, café, chocolate quente, geleia, etc. Nos surpreendeu). Destaque para o atendimento dos recepcionistas, uma delas até falar português falava! Muitos simpáticos e prestativos, tb um diferencial em NY onde todos são muito ríspidos e por vezes o atendimento fica a desejar. Não foi o caso aqui! Fui com bebê de 9 meses, disponibilizaram berço sem custo adicional. Amamos a estadia e queremos voltar muito em breve.

title: Great hotel and amazing staff - friendly and service minded, great location
text:
This was my third stay at The Lex. Every stay has been great! The staff are super friendly and amazingly helpful, very customer service orientated.  I like the Flatiron District and its a short walk to Grammercy and Union Square Park as well as Madison Square Park. Great area! 
The free breakfast has always been fresh and tasty. And each time I've stayed they have added something new...cereal and oatmeal are new additions this time around. They offer apples oranges bananas cereal instant oatmeal muffins and croissants and coffee tea and orange juice. In my book, for the prices you pay here that is a great deal. They even leave you a couple bottles of water each day as well. I've never experienced any noise except some street noise because hello it IS New York city.
The rooms are a decent size for NYC and everything is always super clean. And yes you can call down any time for coffee or tea.   Also every time I have stayed they have added an extra amenity. They have partnered with a local dinner to provides delivery of meals, like room service.  This translates to me to a hotel management that cares about their guests and is constantly trying to offer new and better services. LUV The Lex!!!

title: Clean, Friendly, Boutique hotel in Great location
text: Stayed here for one quick night this past week at the Lex Hotel. Really enjoyed it! It is a small boutique hotel in a great location. About a 20 minute walk or so to Korean Town and close to other fun iconic places to visit. All the staff, both in afternoon and morning at the hotel were very kind and helpful including Romeo who helped check me out. Clean rooms and from what I can tell decently sized for NYC. They had a small breakfast set u as well and offer wine and cheese in the evening and they offer to bring you coffee to your room whenever you need it which is great.
